title: The Desolation of Sentinel Peak Firewatch Will Haunt Me Forever
itunes:title: The Desolation of Sentinel Peak Firewatch Will Haunt Me Forever
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
It doesn't want us there...

***

Written by: Kyle Harrison

***

Bonus episode: "A bad trip on mushrooms showed me something that I still don't know how to explain" written by Zachariusfrost and narrated by Jimmy Ferrer

Content warning: animal sacrifice

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Sound Design by Pacific Obadiah

***

Title music by Alex Aldea



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
